name: Maker Faire Bundle 2017
description:
Thank you so much for coming by my booth at the North Little Rock Mini Maker Faire 2017, and also for checking out this page - your support means so much to me!

Some of the games here will be developed further, some may not - but it's always helpful for me to know what you like about each game and why, so please feel free to leave a comment below or send me an email!

I'm making these available as true pay-what-you-want downloads, pay as little or as much as you like :)

If you're still at the event: Check out SteamGuilds, a game designed by myself and the other members of Little Rock Game Designers!
